title: Hour 1 - James Harden's Fitness, ESPY's Reaction
itunes:title: Hour 1 - James Harden's Fitness, ESPY's Reaction
description:
Dan talks a little about last night's ESPY Awards Show. He also wonders if James Harden can show up in shape for the upcoming NBA season after signing a new contract to remain in Philadelphia.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
